	.setMaxCacheEntries(1000)
	.setMaxObjectSize(8192)

27.1. Traverson

  • Traversonì€ Spring HATEOAS í”„ë¡œì íŠ¸ì˜ ì¼ë¶€ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

  • ì›ë˜ëŠ” Node jsì˜ ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¡ŒìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

	:

  • traverson.follow().toObject()ë¡œ ë‚˜ì˜¨ ê°ì²´ëŠ” Resources<Resource<Player>> ì´ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— foreachë¡œ Resource<Player>ë¥¼ í•˜ë‚˜ì”© ì§‘ì–´ ì›í•˜ëŠ” ë¡œì§ì„ ìˆ˜í–‰í•´ì£¼ë©´ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

    Traverson traverson = new Traverson(
	new URI("http://localhost:8080/"),
	MediaTypes.HAL_JSON
);
PlayerResources playerResources = traverson
	.follow("$_links.team.href", "$_embedded.team[0]._links.players.href")
	.toObject(PlayerResources.class);
for (Resource<Player> playerResource : playerResources.getContent()){
	Player player = playerResource.getContent();
	System.out.println(player);
}

  • Traversonì˜ ë‹¨ì ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

    • Traversalì¼ë¿ Expansionì´ ì•„ë‹™ë‹ˆë‹¤.
    • í¬ë§·ì´ í•œì •ì ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. (Limited capability with other formats)

27.2. Spring Data REST Projections

  • Resource Expansionì˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ë°©ë²•ìœ¼ë¡  Spring Data REST Projectionì´ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

  • Projectionì€ ë§í¬ê°€ â€˜inlinedâ€™ ë˜ê²Œ í•´ì¤ë‹ˆë‹¤.

  • ì‚¬ìš©ë²•ì€ ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

    • @Projectionì¸ ì¸í„°í˜ì´ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ ì¤ë‹ˆë‹¤.

      @Projection(name = "inlinePlayers", type= {Team.classe})
public interface InlinePlayers{
	String getName();
	String getLocation();
	String getMascotte();
	Set<Player> getPlayers();
}

    • ì•„ë˜ì™€ ê°™ì´ projection íŒŒë¼ë¯¸í„°ì— ìœ„ì˜ nameì„ ì£¼ë©´ ì„ ìˆ˜ ëª©ë¡ì„ ë³´ì—¬ì£¼ê²Œ ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

      http://localhost:8080/teams/1?projection=inlinePlayers

  • /teams/ì„ ìš”ì²­í–ˆë‹¤ë©´ ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ì€ ì‘ë‹µì´ ì˜µë‹ˆë‹¤.

    {
	"name" : "Harlem",
	"location" : "Globetrotters",
	"_links" : {
		"self" :{
			"href" : "http://localhost:8080/teams/1{?projection}",
			"templated" : true
		},
		"players" : {
			"href" : "http://localhost:8080/teams/1/players"
		}
	}
}

  • ë§í¬ë¥¼ ë”°ë¼ /teams/?projection=inlinePlayersë¥¼ ìš”ì²­í•˜ë©´ ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ì€ ì‘ë‹µì´ ì˜µë‹ˆë‹¤.
